Saiyan:KiPower.NAME: Ki
DESCRIPTIONS: Used to empower your different abilities

Saiyan:StunPower.NAME: Stun
DESCRIPTIONS: Stunned enemies can't take actions.

Saiyan:Revive.NAME: Revive
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemy will revive when killed with full HP and extra buffs.

Saiyan:Chaoz.NAME: Chaoz
DESCRIPTIONS: Does anybody like chaotzu?

Saiyan:Twize.NAME: Twize
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next Finisher will get triggered Twice!

Saiyan:SoulSpice.NAME: Soul Spice
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you exhaust a Status card gain 1 Strength.

Saiyan:EnergyPlus.NAME: Energy Plus
DESCRIPTIONS: Get [E]  at the start of your turn.

Saiyan:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Finisher only consume half of your Combo.

Saiyan:ReverbHit.NAME: Reverb Hit
DESCRIPTIONS: Will deal damage to the enemy at the start of next round.

Saiyan:Furor.NAME: Defiance
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy receives a buff, gain 1 Strength.

Saiyan:PressOn.NAME: Press On
DESCRIPTIONS: Ignore Ki Costs this turn. Whenever you play a card, add a Ki-Burn to your discard pile.

Saiyan:Reflection.NAME: Reflection
DESCRIPTIONS: Reflects damage back to the attacker.

Saiyan:SuperSaiyanThreeDebuff.NAME: Super Saiyan Three
DESCRIPTIONS: You are empowered by your transformation, but your powers are slowly draining.

Saiyan:PowerStance.NAME: Power Stance
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Attack cards are also Starter.

Saiyan:MajinSeal.NAME: Majin Seal
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack played each turn has its target randomized. Whenever you gain a stack of combo, gain an additional stack.

Saiyan:DragonBall.NAME: Dragon Ball
DESCRIPTIONS: Collect 7 and make a powerful wish come true.

Saiyan:Dodge.NAME: Dodge Chance
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are attacked, you have a chance to dodge the attack equal to your dodge stacks. Lost at the end of the round.

Saiyan:ExtremeSpeed.NAME: Extreme Speed
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw cards when you play a Combo Finisher.

Saiyan:CantRevive.NAME: Can't revive
DESCRIPTIONS: This creature has Revived once and can't do it again.

Saiyan:PlayerFlight.NAME: Flight
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive 50% less damage, lose a stack of Flight when you get attacked. When losing flight gain 1 Weak.

Saiyan:Medicine.NAME: Medicine
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have 2 or more stacks of Medicine transform them into Artifact.

Saiyan:BurningSoul.NAME: Burning Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Spend Ki to gain gain Ki Barrier charges at the end of every turn.

Saiyan:ConcussionPower.NAME: Concussion
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal damage at the end of turn equal to the number of Concussion charges. Increase by 1 at the end of every round.

Saiyan:KiRegen.NAME: Ki Regen
DESCRIPTIONS: Regenerate Ki equal to your Ki Regen amount at the start of every turn.

Saiyan:KiExplosion.NAME: Ki Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked by an enemy, deal back damage equal to the amount of Ki Barrier charges. Expires at end of turn.

Saiyan:SuperSaiyanForm.NAME: Super Saiyan Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Hyaaaaaaaa!!

Saiyan:GreatApe.NAME: Great Ape Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E]  at the start of every turn.

Saiyan:FullMoon.NAME: Full Moon
DESCRIPTIONS: You gaze at the moon, the moon stares back.

Saiyan:ComboPower.NAME: Combo Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: Consume your Combo with a Finisher for enhanced effects.
